Governor Kathy Hochul has declared a disaster emergency in several New York counties due to healthcare staffing shortages, while NYC faces severe weather impacts and rising crime rates, prompting calls for policy reforms and increased oversight in various city programs.

### Risks & Alerts

- Governor Hochul declares a Disaster Emergency in Bronx, Nassau, and New York due to healthcare staffing shortages.
